seed_pair.target: It's the only real hope we have left.
seed_pair.known: Es la única esperanza real que nos queda.

seed_pair.target: The only real hope is that they're not serious.
seed_pair.known: La única esperanza real es que no son serios.

seed_pair.target: Life isn't easy but it's not meant to be easy.
seed_pair.known: La vida no es fácil pero no está destinada a ser fácil.

seed_pair.target: It's meant to be a challenge.
seed_pair.known: Está destinada a ser un desafío.

seed_pair.target: Nothing would make me happier than to get away.
seed_pair.known: Nada me haría más feliz que escapar.

seed_pair.target: I think your eyes are beautiful.
seed_pair.known: Creo que tus ojos son hermosos.

seed_pair.target: It's on the other side of that yellow line.
seed_pair.known: Está al otro lado de esa línea amarilla.

seed_pair.target: If you don't make me a strong cup of coffee right now.
seed_pair.known: Si no me haces una taza de café fuerte ahora mismo.

seed_pair.target: Then I will never trust anyone ever again.
seed_pair.known: Entonces nunca confiaré en nadie nunca más.
